altername_name: Naniwa Wangan Battle: Tarzan Yamada & AutoSelect Sawa Kyoudai
name: Naniwa Wangan Battle
overview: Naniwa Wangan Battle is a high-speed racing game featuring night races of the hottest Japanese autos. The first release of the game was a single-player title, but the second re-release of the game (after being part of the "Race The Best" set of volumes) included 2-player racing. This game is part of the Shutokou Battle series and features three game modes: -Scenario: It's a mode in which you run in a circuit and must finish first, you win money to upgrade your car. -Time attack: Beat the best time in a fight against the clock. -Taiman batle: You need a memory card save to play this mode.
